description: Create an answer related content link.
permissions: Only admin users can create answer related content links (user.is_admin?).
side_effects: Creates an answer_related_content link between an answer and a related content item.
validation_notes: --answer, --related-content-type, and --related-content-id are required. related-content-type accepts newsletters, glossary-terms, release-notes, press-releases, objectives, features, questions, or class names like GlossaryTerm (CLI normalizes singular/plural and class-name variants). The related content must be a Newsletter, GlossaryTerm, ReleaseNote, PressRelease, Objective, Feature, or Question.

flags.name: --related-content-type
flags.validation: Accepts newsletters, glossary-terms, release-notes, press-releases, objectives, features, questions; also accepts class names like GlossaryTerm.
